Title: Relates to banning the use of biometric identifying technology in schools
Summary: Prohibits the use of biometric identifying technology in schools for any reason other than certain specified purposes; adds fingerprint identification of teachers, administrators and students for the purpose of securely logging into a digital device for academic and administrative purpose to allowable purposes.
LawCode: Amd ยง106-b, St Tech L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state technology law, in relation to banning the use of biometric identifying technology in schools
